General.Name: Zhejiang Gongdong Medical Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Gongdong Medical Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells disposable medical consumables in China. Its products include blood collection tubes, cell culture products, lab consumables, specimen collection containers, disposable lab consumables, epidemic prevention products, nursing plastic wares, and pharmaceutical packaging products. Zhejiang Gongdong Medical Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Taizhou, China.
